dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5948 IH: To terminate the Office of Gun Violence Prevention in the Executive Office of the President and prohibit the establishment of any similar successor office, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Rosendale (for himself, Mr. Donalds, Mr. Gosar, Mr. Higgins of Louisiana, Mr. Burlison, Mr. Biggs, Mr. Good of Virginia, Mr. Crane, Mr. Duncan, and Mr. Collins) introduced the following bill
Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To terminate the Office of Gun Violence Prevention in the Executive Office of the President and prohibit the establishment of any similar successor office, and for other purposes.

section.header: Termination of the Office of Gun Violence Prevention

subsection.text: The Office of Gun Violence Prevention in the Executive Office of the President shall be terminated as of the date of the enactment of this Act.
The President may not establish any successor office to the Office of Gun Violence Prevention.
No Federal funds may be obligated or expended for the salaries or expenses of any officer or employee of an office described in subsection (a) or (b).
